title: Vei's Surgery Thread (will update)
body:
Hiya. My surgery will be taking place at St. Johns in Santa Monica within the next couple of hours. 

Once it starts, it will probably last around 6 hours. That's just the prep and the time after the actual operation, which will take around 3 hours. 

They call it a Lefort 1, with a bilateral saggital split of the mandible. Sounds scary I guess lol. But at this point I just want to get it over with. 

Thanks all of you who wish me luck. I'm here to chat for some time before they take me in. 

How are you? 

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/68/a4/20/68a420a9187599a574321ad4bbdbb30c.jpg?noredirect

https://d.wattpad.com/story_parts/159534438/images/13ff4271f84bc862.jpg

EDIT: I've been feeling nauseous so i havent been able to do much but sleep... but sleep is getting boring real fast lol. 

My teeth are being held shut together by rubber bands for 2 weeks. I can open my lips a little, but my lower lip is like 95% numb... 

Time is just passing slowly. But I'm doing ok. Thank you all for your kind words and support <3
